headline: Clorox (NYSE:CLX) Partners With Miller Lite For Limited-Time Beercoal Charcoal Release
summary: Last week, Kingsford, a subsidiary of Clorox (NYSE:CLX), reintroduced the Kingsford x Miller Lite Beercoal, marking its national retail debut due to previous sell-out successes. Despite this product’s anticipated popularity, Clorox shares saw a 2.05% decline over the week. This decrease stood in contrast to broader market trends, with the S&P 500 climbing 4.5% amid positive investor sentiment following the temporary easing of U.S.-China tariffs. The Beercoal launch may have helped offset some...
